message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand your offer of $110, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $127. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $127. I'm willing to meet you at $122, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?

I'm not willing to go as low as $122, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $128. I think this is the lowest price I can accept and still make a reasonable profit. What do you think?
